description: The royal palace of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fish-Man Island, where King Neptune and the royal family reside. A magnificent palace known for its grandeur and beauty.

keyEvents.title: Invitation to Ryugu Palace
keyEvents.description: King Neptune invites the Straw Hat Pirates to a banquet at Ryugu Palace. Pappag provides exposition about the palace's magnificence.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces Ryugu Palace as an important location and sets up the Straw Hats' visit there in upcoming episodes.

statusHistory.reason: Royal palace is operational and serving as the seat of government

description: The underwater waters surrounding Fish-Man Island where ships and sea creatures travel. This area serves as the approach to Fish-Man Island proper.

keyEvents.title: Gyro Pursued by Hody
keyEvents.description: Gyro attempts to escape from Hody Jones through the waters around Fish-Man Island after refusing to join the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the demonstration of Hody's power in this location.

keyEvents.title: Hody Destroys Gyro's Ship
keyEvents.description: Hody Jones uses his Energy Steroid-enhanced power to completely destroy Gyro's ship in these waters, demonstrating his overwhelming strength.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes this location as a place where Hody demonstrates his power and terrorizes those who oppose him.
